summary: An ex-sportswriter is hired by a shady fight promoter to promote his latest find, an unknown but easily exploitable rising star from Argentina.
cast: Humphrey Bogart|Rod Steiger|Jan Sterling|Mike Lane|Max Baer|Jersey Joe Walcott|Edward Andrews|Harold J. title: Más dura será la caída
